user.name: Sanskar Kumar
user.bio: Full Stack Web Developer | Final Year CSE Undergraduate at NIT DELHI

node.name: Mistryhub
node.description: MistryHub is a web application that leverages the power of ReactJS, NodeJS, and ExpressJS to connect skilled professionals and clients. It utilizes MongoDB for efficient data storage and retrieval. With seamless integration of Axios, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and MaterialUI, MistryHub offers a user-friendly interface and visually appealing design.

node.name: MovieBuff
node.description: MovieBuff is a web application developed using React and Firebase that provides users with a platform to watch movie trailers and create their personal movie lists. With MovieBuff, users can explore a vast collection of movies and easily access their trailers to get a sneak peek into the film.

node.name: HostelWorld
node.description: HostelWorld is a dynamic platform that simplifies hostel management and accommodation booking for students. With an intuitive interface, admins can effortlessly add and manage hostels, while students can easily search, view, and book their preferred hostel. Experience a hassle-free solution for hostel management and booking, all in one place.

node.name: DigiNotes
node.description: A React app with NodeJS at the backend with login feature and OTP verification that allows you to create and manage your notes.

node.name: Simon
node.description: Simon is an electronic game of memory skill .The device creates a series of tones and lights and requires a user to repeat the sequence. If the user succeeds, the series becomes progressively longer and more complex. Once the user fails or the time limit runs out, the game is over.
